quest.name: Sealing the Deal
journal:
Regitt needs a hand resolving a purchasing dilemma.

Speak with the dwarven trader in Sullen.
Deliver the requested item to the Mord merchant.
objectives: Speak with the dwarven trader in Sullen.
Synthesize [Error]Deliver [Error] to the Mord merchant in Sullen.

dialogue.name: REGITT
dialogue.text: Grrr. I sent our trader out to purchase cannon parts, but he's taking his sweet time getting back. Surely he didn't get lost following the road...? ...Ah! I bet my beard he's stuck haggling with the merchant.

dialogue.name: REGITT
dialogue.text: You've struck your fair share of bargains, I expect. Would you mind wandering down to Sullen? Our beleaguered buyer might need help sealing the deal.

dialogue.name: MORDMERCHANT03918
dialogue.text: Another trader? You'll have to wait your turn.

dialogue.name: DWARF03918
dialogue.text: Regitt was worried, was he? Well he should've given me a fatter sack of coin! This merchant won't part with the parts we need no matter how much I plead for a cheaper price...

dialogue.name: DWARF03918
dialogue.text: ...I know! Maybe you can forge something pretty from the stock I have with me. Some manner of trinket that's like to catch a Mord's beady eye!

dialogue.name: DWARF03918
dialogue.text: ...I know! Maybe you can craft something pretty from the stock I have with me. Some manner of bespoke household fitting that's like to catch a Mord's beady eye!

dialogue.name: DWARF03918
dialogue.text: ...I know! Maybe you can concoct something tasty from the stock I have with me. Some manner of herbal tea or suchlike that's pleasing to a Mord's palate!

dialogue.name: DWARF03918
dialogue.text: Don't be shy about asking for more materials if you come up short. I'll be here, just waiting to see this bloke's reaction when you offer to trade him your latest masterpiece!

dialogue.name: DWARF03918
dialogue.text: If you're happy with your creation, you can hand it directly to our merchant friend here.

dialogue.name: DWARF03918
dialogue.text: If you're happy with your creation, you can hand it directly to our merchant friend here.

dialogue.name: DWARF03918
dialogue.text: If you're happy with your creation, you can hand it directly to our merchant friend here.

dialogue.name: DWARF03918
dialogue.text: Ran out of bits and pieces, did you? Well, here's a few more!

dialogue.name: DWARF03918
dialogue.text: Ran out of bits and pieces, did you? Well, here's a few more!

dialogue.name: DWARF03918
dialogue.text: Ran out of ingredients, did you? Well, here's a few more!

dialogue.name: MORDMERCHANT03918
dialogue.text: Hm? You offer to pay the difference for the dwarf? Fine. Coin or barter, it's all the same to me.

dialogue.name: MORDMERCHANT03918
dialogue.text: ...Yes! Agreed! The parts are yours! Take them, take them!

dialogue.name: DWARF03918
dialogue.text: Hah! I knew it!

dialogue.name: DWARF03918
dialogue.text: You're a handy sort to have around, Forename, thank you! If you're headed back to the Anvil, please let Regitt know I'm on the way with the cannon parts.

dialogue.name: DWARF03918
dialogue.text: Head on back to Regitt. I'll be along with the parts once I've settled accounts here.

dialogue.name: MORDMERCHANT03918
dialogue.text: If I'd known you had goods like that for trade, I would've doubled the price. We make more deals in the future, yes?

dialogue.name: REGITT
dialogue.text: The haggling's all sorted, then? That's great news!

dialogue.name: REGITT
dialogue.text: We might find work-arounds for some of those materials, but we need the gemstones. Nothing else comes close to their aether-expanding properties...

dialogue.name: REGITT
dialogue.text: Aye, I hate to say it, but even a dwarf'd be hard-pressed to improve upon the Crystaville's design. That Lorathia lady and her students really know how to build a cannon!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Normal-quality items crafted in the course of this quest serve no purpose and cannot be sold. It is recommended that you discard them.
